description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Dashboard' that manages and displays a list of Jira projects. It includes state management for projects, filtering, view modes, and modal display for project details. It also handles fetching data from an API and rendering UI elements such as headers, search, filters, and project cards.

methods.name: Dashboard
methods.description: React functional component that renders a dashboard for Jira projects, including fetching, filtering, and displaying projects, as well as handling user interactions.
